summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the acquisition of approximately 4.0 acres of property composed of uplands, banks and submerged lands of Slip 4 ("the Property"), an arm of the Lower Duwamish Waterway, from Crowley Marine Services, Inc. and its related entities; authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement and acceptance of a Special Warranty Deed for the Property; and placing the Property under the jurisdiction of Seattle Public Utilities.
note: Slip 4 Clean-up, Lower Duwamish Superfund Site
